text: The treatment I have received here for my shin splints has significantly improved my quality life. I cannot speak highly enough of Dr. Kardem and Dr. Mark and all their staff - they are all professional, caring and considerate. Podiatry is an important part of one’s overall health and this is a fantastic practice. Thank you to the Family Podiatry team that has helped with my treatment.

If you are experiencing any foot issues, do come here for a very professional and thorough review,and tailored solutions. Dr Kiter provides excellent guidance and recommendations for long term solutions. The support team members are also very warm and friendly. Highly recommended.
Dr Mark and team is fantastic, been a patient since 2023. Custom orthotics made for my feet and regular checkups to make sure I’m progressing well
Dr Mark able to analyse my back & leg issues accurately. Gave great advice, treatment services with care and patience.

I’ve seen Dr Kardem twice, once during pregnancy and one post and she has always been efficient and informative in my approach to shoes and walking styles. I always feel comfortable after my treatment and consultation. Big tick for her and the clinic!
